page.title: 05 A day in the life of Jacqui
page.content: I get up at 8.00a.m. and get washed and dressed. I have my breakfast and go to school. We start school at 9.00a.m. Our teacher allows us to sit any where we like. In my class there are 20 children whose ages range from 7 to 11. When we come in first thing in the morning we have to do the work on the black-board. Our morning play is at 10.30a.m. We have packed lunches, or you can go home. My class teacher is also the Headteacher, but on Tuesdays and Fridays we are taken by Mrs. Wilmot.We finish school at 4.00p.m. and then I walk home. I get changed and go out to play until I have my tea at about half past six. After tea I will watch television until it is time to get ready for bed. I goto bed at 9.15p.m.
